title: Changing fortunes? Arteta's 'special day' leaves Lampard 'angry'
description: Mikel Arteta hails Arsenal's win as 'a special day' but Frank Lampard calls his team 'lazy' after Chelsea's 3-1 defeat.

title: 'Embarrassed' Sheffield United set unwanted records
description: Sheffield United are "embarrassed" to be bottom of the Premier League and without a win, says midfielder Ben Osborn.

title: Highlights: Ten-man Aston Villa fire three past Crystal Palace in Premier League
description: Watch match highlights as Aston Villa put in an impressive display to beat Crystal palace 3-0 on Boxing Day, despite playing more than half of the game with 10 players.

title: Christmas Day sinkhole closes part of Clifton road
description: Residents said they heard a "loud noise" at about 22:30 GMT on Christmas Day.

title: Doctor Who: Saxmundham superfan, 8, given Tardis door frame
description: The custom-made design comes complete with whirring lights - and is definitely bigger on the inside.

title: Aerial footage shows flooding in Bedfordshire
description: Thousands of people have left their homes near the River Great Ouse amid "severe" flood warnings.

title: Queen's Christmas message returns to top of TV ratings
description: A total of 8.14 million watched her address, and it was also a good day for channel-hopping Bradley Walsh.

title: Bedfordshire flooding: Evacuation centres set up
description: Bedfordshire fire crews are trying to divert flood water, but say the situation is "very difficult".

title: George Blake: Soviet Cold War spy and former MI6 officer dies in Russia
description: Blake was one of the Cold War's most notorious double agents and betrayed dozens of MI6 personnel.

title: Covid: Festive charity dips cancelled due to pandemic
description: Organisers have pulled the plug on people taking the plunge this year due to the pandemic.

title: LeBron James helps Lakers to Christmas Day win - NBA round-up
description: LeBron James and Anthony Davis lead the Los Angeles Lakers to a comfortable 138-115 victory over the Dallas Mavericks on Christmas Day.

title: The Cold War double agent who 'never belonged'
description: A look back at the life of the British spy turned double agent, who fled to the Soviet Union.

title: Mainland Scotland moves into level 4 lockdown
description: The highest level of restrictions are now in force for millions of people to curb the spread of a new strain of coronavirus.

title: Brexit: UK and EU can have 'special relationship', says Michael Gove
description: The cabinet secretary says he has lost friends over Brexit and admits it turned UK politics "ugly".

title: Covid-19: Tougher Covid rules begin for millions in UK
description: More areas in England enter tier four, as lockdowns begin in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.

title: From the 'cage' to the Premier League - Eze's rise to the top
description: Crystal Palace midfielder Eberechi Eze tells BBC Sport about earning respect on London's 'cage football' scene and the help he has received from team-mate Wilfried Zaha.

title: India on top as Australia's Smith makes first Test duck since 2016
description: Australia's talisman Steve Smith falls for his first Test duck in over four years as India dismiss the hosts for 195 on day one of the Boxing Day Test.

title: Next week crucial for Arsenal to avoid relegation battle - Arteta
description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says the next seven days will be crucial for the Gunners if they are to avoid a relegation battle.

title: Coronavirus: France finds first case of new variant
description: The health ministry says an asymptomatic Frenchman who arrived from England tested positive.

title: Leicester friends feed 2,000 people Christmas dinner
description: Festive meals have been cooked and given to homeless and vulnerable people in the Midlands.

title: Brexit: The Irish port of Rosslare is hoping to benefit
description: Rosslare hopes Brexit will bring benefits as more hauliers seek to avoid the UK land bridge.

title: Coronavirus: How the pandemic sparked a puppy craze
description: It seems buying a dog has become as popular as Zoom quizzes, but animal charities have concerns.

title: Coronavirus: Northern Ireland begins six-week lockdown
description: Only essential shops can remain open and must close by 20:00 every day in the first week of lockdown.

title: The Papers: The Queen's pride and a new special relationship?
description: The Boxing Day front pages reflect on the Queen's Christmas address and the UK's post-Brexit future

title: Business review of 2020: Covid-19 and Trump
description: 2020 saw countries grapple with coronavirus, balancing both public health and economic concerns.

title: Nashville explosion: Camper van blows up in 'intentional act' on Christmas morning
description: Three people are injured in the blast and possible human remains are later found near the site.

title: TV in 2021: Shows coming to the small screen
description: Despite the impact of Covid-19 on the industry, there are still some popular shows on the way.

title: Mark Easton's Boxing Day family puzzler 2020
description: This is the festive quiz in which no-one is expected to know any of the answers.

title: The Masked Singer UK: The most Covid-safe show of 2020?
description: Host Joel Dommett chats about the second series of the Masked Singer UK - the singing celebrity guessing game.

title: The casualties of this year's viral conspiracy theories
description: Conspiracy theories ripped through the internet this year, destroying relationships and endangering lives.

title: The family with no fingerprints
description: A family in Bangladesh struggles with an extremely rare genetic condition, "immigration delay disease".

title: Extreme E: Lewis Hamilton helping make racing environmentally friendly
description: Lewis Hamilton isn't just the world's most successful F1 driver, he's also a key backer of a new off-road electric vehicle racing series called Extreme E.

title: Fur-st Family: The long history of US presidents and pets
description: From Socks the cat to Macaroni the pony, the US presidential tradition is returning with Joe Biden.
